title: EngFlow Makes C++ Builds 21x Faster and Software a Lot Safer
author: Darryl K Taft
description: EngFlow brings remote execution and caching technology to C/C++ developers, speeding up build times up to 21x while addressing critical safety requirements.
cntitle: EngFlow 使 C++ 构建速度提高 21 倍，软件安全性大大提高
cndescription: EngFlow 为 C/C++ 开发人员带来了远程执行和缓存技术，在满足关键安全要求的同时，将构建速度提高了 21 倍。
